articles.title: Hogwarts Legacy 2 is in Development, It's Claimed - Insider Gaming
articles.description: A new claim suggests that Hogwarts Legacy 2 is in development, presumably by Avalanche Software following the success of the original.
articles.content:
A new claim suggests that Hogwarts Legacy 2 is in development, presumably by Avalanche Software.

articles.content: I've spent a chunk of my week at IFA 2023, and as the biggest AV nerd on the TechRadar team in Berlin, it was obviously my job to hunt down interesting TVs at the show. IFA is usually good for TVs – … [+9215 chars]

articles.title: Starfield fan creates 'Millennium Falcon' - great Solo effort - Video Gamer
articles.description: It didn't take long for one of sci-fi's most iconic ships to make its way to Starfield, even if it is on a budget.
articles.content: Arguably, the modern-day take on sci-fi would be completely different without the influence of Star Wars. Every piece of media has paid homage to the sci-fi juggernaut in some way, and Starfield is n… [+2036 chars]
